item.title: pipenv
item.description: pipenv is a tool like npm - it creates, per project, an isolated virtual env. Pipenv is a tool that aims to bring the best of all packaging worlds (bundler, composer, npm, cargo, yarn, etc.) to the Python world. Windows is a firstâ€“class citizen, in our world. It automatically creates and manages a virtualenv for your projects, as well as adds/removes packages from your Pipfile as you install/uninstall packages.
